content:
I found a small issue with the CAT-SOOP website, but it is accessibility-related, so I'd like to report it to the maintainers.

Could you please point me in the right direction to do that?

The issue is that all the pages have the same title, so using the browser's History feature to try to find a page is made difficult.

Thank you.
subject: Where to report website issue?

content:
I think I found what I was looking for:

https://catsoop.mit.edu/website
